summary: Ape by Matt Furie - In the fantastical realm of Hedz, crafted by the visionary Matt Furie, dwells the iconic Ape. This original NFT character embodies a whimsical spirit and a love for weed, infusing every scene with laid-back charm and boundless adventure. Ape’s story is a magical journey through Furie’s surreal universe, where humor and wonder intertwine in perfect harmony
